name: DOWNN 2 - Double Depths
description:
Introducing DOWNN 2, the sequel to the successful spinoff series 'DOWNN'

In this game, you play as Pablo, a man with the eagerness of getting rich quick, as you must help him dig to reach Planet Prime statues, containing lots of money!

Go play the original DOWNN here! - https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/556471314/

Credits to Nintendo for the music.
